item.title: Project 3: FIFA 18 Ultimate Team EDA
item.description: This projects GitHub repository is available here Project Overview Developed a project where I forecasted player values with predictive analytic techniques. Developed using R. Plots and other visualization techniques of R are used before analysis. Random Forest Model, Multiple Regression, Lasso and Ridge Regression, and Regression Tree models are used. Interpreted the models with their RMSE In this project I defined 2 questions related to Labor Force Survey for Istanbul.
